title: Black Ranked Champ Select Screen
body:
On the new client I was queuing for a ranked game and I accepted the ranked match notification. A player declined and that happened about two more times, on the third try I accepted and it was just a black screen, I could hear the bans going on in the background but I cannot interact with any of the interface except the buttons on the upper right of the client. By the time my ban time was up I got kicked out onto the lobby screen. Unfortunately, it kicked me out of my promos.

1. Log into league client
2. Create a solo queue rank game
3. Be declined a match three times
4. Enter a match
5. Hear the bans going on in the background but a black screen
6. Profit

replies.body:
We're currently collecting more information on this issue, and requesting some logs to help!  You can find the log files by following this path:

**C:\Riot Games\Logs\LeagueClient Logs\**

In that folder, you'll want to provide the following log file types:
a. LeagueClient.log
b. LeagueClientUx.log

You can then perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to fix the issue as a temporary workaround.  I hope that helps!
Same thing happened to me twice in a row. Lost 6 LP and got locked out for 35 minutes.
